title: Where do i get my season rewards?
body: Let's say i landed at bronze and made it up all the way to gold in solo/duo queue, after a while, i start playing flex queue and hit silver. Do i get my season rewards from flex queue or solo/duo? Thanks in advanced.

replies.body:
Great news everyone! You should actually get the rewards for both!

We recently updated our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760) to say that solo/duo queues will have their own unique rewards at the end of the season, and ranked flex will have it's own unique rewards as well ^_^.
they said they will have seperate rewards for flex and soloq but a special one for those who do good in both
